div.h2: Includes details on food distribution, student medication, and more
div.p: Some information as GP Schools are closed:
EDUCATIONAL PACKETS--Can be picked up at your child's school Mon., March 16, from 1:00-4:00 or Tue., March 17 from 11:00-12:30. Packets will be available at your child's school in the foyer.

FOOD DISTRIBUTION--Breakfast and lunch will be available for free for children 0-18. Please call the school WHERE YOU WANT TO PICK UP--Perry or Griggsville--and let them know how many. The first pickup will be Tue. March 17, from 11:00-12:30. More information will be posted separately.
STUDENT MEDICATION--If your child has medication at school, we ask that you pick that up Mon., March 16. Someone in the office will help you.
If you have any questions, please let us know, and please have patience as we work this situation. Thank you for your support.
